scripts.preinstall: npm i -g bower grunt grunt-cli jshint copyfiles rimraf mkdirp browserify uglifyjs mocha
scripts.install-polyfill: npm install webvr-polyfill && npm install js-polyfills && npm install promise-polyfill
scripts.build-polyfill: copyfiles -f src/feature-detector.js node_modules/webvr-polyfill/build/webvr-polyfill.js node_modules/promise-polyfill/Promise.min.js node_modules/js-polyfills/es5.js node_modules/js-polyfills/dom.js node_modules/js-polyfills/typedarray.js js/lib
scripts.build: npm run build-app && copyfiles -f src/feature-detector.js js/lib
scripts.buildall: npm install && npm run install-polyfill && npm run build-polyfill && npm run install-three && npm run build-three && npm run build-app
